original_text: He said, “If anyone ties me securely with new ropes that have never been used, I’ll become as weak as any other man.”
korean_text: 삼손이 그에게 이르되 만일 쓰지 아니한 새 밧줄들로 나를 결박하면 내가 약해져서 다른 사람과 같으리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: with new ropes that have never been used
I'll become as weak as any other man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 다른 사람들과 같이 약해질 것입니다
